package.name: uuid-nix
package.author: PPPDUD
package.description: A stand-in replacement for the uuid package.
package.title: UUID generation for *nix systems

manifest.name: uuid-nix
manifest.title: UUID generation for *nix systems
manifest.description: A stand-in replacement for the uuid package.
manifest.author: PPPDUD

packageRepo.readme:
# Another UUID generation tool
This is a stand-in replacement for the [`uuid`](https://hub.espanso.org/uuid) package that doesn't require Python. To prevent conflicts, you should make sure that `uuid` is not installed before adding `uuid-nix`.

Usage is exactly the same: `:uuid` creates a UUID with dashes, and `:nuuid` creates a UUID without dashes.

Note that this package only works on Linux distros and macOS; Windows (except when using WSL) is not currently supported.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - trigger: ":uuid"
    replace: "{{command}}"
    propagate_case: true
    vars:
      - name: command
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: "uuidgen"
          shell: wsl
  - trigger: ":nuuid"
    replace: "{{command}}"
    propagate_case: true
    vars:
      - name: command
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: "uuidgen | sed 's/-//g'"
          shell: wsl
